sentence.Network_en: Implicit in his speech was the assumption that they were guilty.
sentence.Network_cn: 他话语中的言外之意是设定他们有罪。

sentence.Network_en: A soldier must give implicit obedience to his officers.
sentence.Network_cn: 士兵必须绝对服从他的长官.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from French implicite or Latin implicitus, later form of implicatus 'entwined', past participle of implicare (see imply)

encyclopedia.content: implicit 关键字用于声明隐式的用户定义类型转换运算符。如果转换过程可以确保不会造成数据丢失，则可使用该关键字在用户定义类型和其他类型之间进行隐式转换。 备注 隐式转换可以通过消除不必要的类型转换来提高源代码的可读性。但是，因为隐式转换不需要程序员将一种类型显式强制转换为另一种类型，所以使用隐式转换时必须格外小心，以免出现意外结果。一般情况下，隐式转换运算符应当从不引发异常并且从不丢失信息，以便可以在

entry.def: Something that is implicit is expressed in an indirect way.

example.ex: This is seen as an implicit warning not to continue with military action...
example.tran: 这被视为一个停止军事行动的含蓄警告。

example.ex: Branagh says that it was his intention to make explicit in the film what was only implicit in the play.
example.tran: 布莱纳说他的用意是将剧本中的隐晦含意在电影中清晰明白地表现出来。

entry.def: If a quality or element is implicit in something, it is involved in it or is shown by it.

example.ex: ...the delays implicit in formal council meetings...
example.tran: 正式的政务会议所惯有的耽搁延迟

example.ex: Try and learn from the lessons implicit in the failure of your marriage.
example.tran: 要努力从失败婚姻中吸取教训。

entry.tran: 无疑问的;无保留的;绝对的
entry.def: If you say that someone has an implicit belief or faith in something, you mean that they have complete faith in it and no doubts at all.

example.ex: He had implicit faith in the noble intentions of the Emperor.
example.tran: 他对皇帝的高尚意图深信不疑。

means.word_mean: 1. implied though not directly expressed; inherent in the nature of something;

sentences.sentence: "an implicit agreement not to raise the subject"
"there was implicit criticism in his voice"
"the oak is implicit in the acorn"

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =fold,表示"重叠,重复"; 2. 折; 3. 弯

stems_affixes.word_buile: complicate使..复杂+ed……的→adj.复杂的, 难解的
ex出+plic重叠,重复+able可以……的→能把重叠的东西弄出来→可解释的→explicate形容词
im进入+plic重叠+it→进入重叠→不直说→含蓄的
ac加强+com+plic重叠,重复+e→共同重叠在一起做事→同谋
complicate弄复杂+ion表名词→complication复杂,纠纷
com共同+plic重叠,重复+ity表名词→共同重叠→同谋的关系
implicate含蓄表达+ion表名词→暗指
re再+plic重叠,重复+a表名词→再重叠[一分]的[东西]→复制品
com全部+plic重叠,重复+ate使……→全部重叠起来→弄复杂
ex出+plic重叠,重复+ate使……→把重叠的东西弄出来→解释
ex出,往外+ploit=plic重叠+it→把折叠之物展开→使用

stems_affixes.value_cn: 牵连[于罪行中],含蓄表达
stems_affixes.word_buile: im进入+plic重叠,重复+ate表动词→[说话]进入重叠,不直说→含蓄表达
re再+plic重叠,重复+ate表动词→再重叠[一分]→复制

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"向内,成为,进入,使……"; 2. 表示"不,无,非"

stems_affixes.word_buile: im向内,成为,进入,使……+passion激情+ed……的→adj.慷慨激昂的
im向内,成为,进入,使……+plic重叠+it→进入重叠→不直说→储蓄的
im不,无,非+moral道德的→adj.不道德的
im不,无,非+mortal死的→adj.不朽的
im不,无,非+mutable可变的→adj.不变的
im不,无,非+partial有偏见的→adj.公平的
im不,无,非+pass感情+ive……的→没感情
im不,无,非+pecc斑点+able……的→无斑点的
im不,无,非+polite礼貌的→adj.无礼的
im不,无,非+possible可能的→adj.不可能的
im向内,成为,进入,使……+migrate移居→入住
im向内,成为,进入,使……+pel推→推进,驱动
im向内,成为,进入,使……+peril危险→v.使处于危险中
im向内,成为,进入,使……+person人+ate表动词→进入别人→扮演别人
im向内,成为,进入,使……+prison监狱→v.监禁
im向内,成为,进入,使……+pulse跳动→内在推动→冲动

Sentence.sentence: They found that implicit bias has fallen by as much as 90% compared with the level found in a similar study in 2006.

Drop in bias Brian Nosek of the University of Virginia in Charlottesville, who runs a website that measures implicit bias using similar test, has also observed a small drop in bias in the 700,000 visitors to the site since January 2007, which might be explained by Obama's rise to popularity
